_wireClassWithDependencies ( array $  matrix  )  [private]

Wires the map with given (existing) instances

This method is used to wire the instances given via arguments $matrix with the corresponding Id's from the static map.

Parameters:
array $matrix The matrix containing the instances for wiring (id => instance)
Returns:
void private
Author:
Benjamin Carl <opensource@clickalicious.de>
Since:
Method available since Release 1.0.0
Version:
1.0
Exceptions:
Di_Exception (non-PHPdoc)
See also:

Definition at line 180 of file Map.php.

References $namespace.

wire ( $  mode = self::WIRE_MODE_AUTOMATIC,
array $  matrix = array() 
)

Wires existing instances of classes

This method is intend to connect existing instances from argument $matrix or retrieved from globals with the existing map. This connection is identified by the "id" in the map and the "key" in the array.

Parameters:
integer $mode This can be either WIRE_MODE_MANUAL or WIRE_MODE_AUTOMATIC
array $matrix A matrix defining the relation between an Id and an Instance as key => value pair
Returns:
boolean TRUE on success, otherwise FALSE public
Author:
Benjamin Carl <opensource@clickalicious.de>
Since:
Method available since Release 1.0.0
Version:
1.0
Exceptions:
Di_Exception 

Reimplemented in Di_Map_Fluent.
